name: @foundationjs/persistence
description: Persistence handling for the Foundation Framework

scripts.major: git commit -a && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.minor: git commit -a && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.patch: git commit -a && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.dev: npm run build && git commit -a && git push
scripts.build: babel source -d dist && flow-copy-source -v source dist
scripts.watch: babel source -d dist --watch & flow-copy-source -v source dist --watch

author: Jérémie VAN DER SANDE <jeremie.vandersande@gmail.com>
